mapper.select: select OPER, NAME, MOBILE, DBCLASS, PASSWORD, LOGINFLAG, LOGINIP, LOGINTIME, TEAM, GROUPID, AREA, MANAGERAREA, BIRTHDAY, IDENTIFYNUM, SEX, ACTIVEFLAG, LOCKED, TELEPHONE, DEPART, POSITION, SPCODE, RESERVE1, RESERVE2, RESERVE3, RESERVE4, RESERVE5, OPERID, STORAGE, MENUID from db_sysadmin where OPER = #{oper,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select OPER, NAME, MOBILE, DBCLASS, PASSWORD, LOGINFLAG, LOGINIP, LOGINTIME, TEAM, GROUPID, AREA, MANAGERAREA, BIRTHDAY, IDENTIFYNUM, SEX, ACTIVEFLAG, LOCKED, TELEPHONE, DEPART, POSITION, SPCODE, RESERVE1, RESERVE2, RESERVE3, RESERVE4, RESERVE5, OPERID, STORAGE, MENUID from db_sysadmin
mapper.sql: OPER , NAME , MOBILE , DBCLASS , PASSWORD , LOGINFLAG , LOGINIP , LOGINTIME , TEAM , GROUPID , AREA , MANAGERAREA , BIRTHDAY , IDENTIFYNUM , SEX , ACTIVEFLAG , LOCKED , TELEPHONE , DEPART , POSITION , SPCODE , RESERVE1 , RESERVE2 , RESERVE3 , RESERVE4 , RESERVE5 , OPERID , STORAGE , MENUID

OPER = #{oper,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
MOBILE = #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
DBCLASS = #{dbclass,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
PASSWORD = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
LOGINFLAG = #{loginflag,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and
LOGINIP = #{loginip,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
LOGINTIME = #{logintime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and
TEAM = #{team,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
GROUPID = #{groupid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
AREA = #{area,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
MANAGERAREA = #{managerarea,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
BIRTHDAY = #{birthday,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
IDENTIFYNUM = #{identifynum,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
SEX = #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
ACTIVEFLAG = #{activeflag,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and
LOCKED = #{locked,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and
TELEPHONE = #{telephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
DEPART = #{depart,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
POSITION = #{position,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
SPCODE = #{spcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
RESERVE1 = #{reserve1,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
RESERVE2 = #{reserve2,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
RESERVE3 = #{reserve3,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
RESERVE4 = #{reserve4,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
RESERVE5 = #{reserve5,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
OPERID = #{operid,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and
STORAGE = #{storage,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
MENUID = #{menuid,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}
and 1=1

OPER = #{oper,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
MOBILE = #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
DBCLASS = #{dbclass,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
PASSWORD = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,

LOGINTIME = #{logintime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} ,

GROUPID = #{groupid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
AREA = #{area,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
MANAGERAREA = #{managerarea,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
BIRTHDAY = #{birthday,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
IDENTIFYNUM = #{identifynum,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
SEX = #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
ACTIVEFLAG = #{activeflag,jdbcType=DECIMAL} ,
LOCKED = #{locked,jdbcType=DECIMAL} ,
TELEPHONE = #{telephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
DEPART = #{depart,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,

SPCODE = #{spcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,

RESERVE3 = #{reserve3,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
RESERVE4 = #{reserve4,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
RESERVE5 = #{reserve5,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
OPERID = #{operid,jdbcType=DECIMAL} ,
STORAGE = #{storage,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
MENUID = #{menuid,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}
, 1=1
